revisions.rev:
'''[[Roman Empire]]''' usually refers to the autocratic government centered in Rome and in its successor capitals on the Italian peninsula from 27 BC to 395 AD.
'''Roman Empire''' may also refer to:
*[[Roman Republic]] (509 BCâ27 BC), an empire in the sense of territory but not form of government. *[[Byzantine Empire|Eastern Roman Empire]] (330â1453), also known as the Byzantine Empire *[[Western Roman Empire]] (286â476) *[[Holy Roman Empire]] (962â1806) *[[Italian Empire]] (1880sâ1943), referred to by Benito Mussolini as a "New Roman Empire". *''[[Roman's Empire]]'', a comedy television show on BBC Two *[[The Fall of the Roman Empire (film)|''The Fall of the Roman Empire'' (film)]], a 1964 epic film by Paramount Pictures *[[Imperium Romanum (video game)]], 2008 video game developed by Haemimont Games
==See also== *[[Ancient Rome]] *[[History of Rome]] *[[Decline of the Roman Empire]]
